articles.description: Human Headphones are two pieces, like most portable earbuds, but they’re built with an over-ear design for both better audio quality and more effective adaptive sound.
articles.content: Headphones come in a lot of styles, but there isnt really a one-size-fits-all approach. While earbuds are no doubt the most convenient, they can never match the sound quality or battery life of a set… [+2064 chars]
